meanings.definition: Existing in large quantities or numbers.
meanings.sent1: The forest was abounding with colorful birds.
meanings.sent2: The market was abounding with fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The birthday party was abounding with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was abounding, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The library was abounding with books of all genres.

meanings.sent1: Her cup was abounding with hot chocolate.
meanings.sent2: The river was abounding with fish during the spawning season.
meanings.sent3: The suitcase was abounding with clothes, barely able to close.
meanings.sent4: His heart was abounding with love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The garden was abounding with colorful flowers, a sight to behold.
